objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Comedy lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about travel and tourism using neutral register
Students create original comedy themed content about travel and tourism in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Comedy story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within comedy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
